featured.text: Then as commercial air travel became popular in the 1950s and airplanes began flying higher and faster, three planes mysteriously broke apart in midair.
In the Bermuda Triangle, a region in the western part of the North Atlantic Ocean, some airplanes and ships were reported to have mysteriously disappeared without a _____.

definition.zh_def: 神秘地，難以理解或解釋地。
definition.en_def: In a way that is difficult to understand or explain; in a mysterious manner.
definition.example: The lights turned off mysteriously, leaving everyone in the dark.
